Description.Text: AZIMUT Hotel Amur Bay is a modern 3-star property offering comfortable accommodation in the heart of Vladivostok. Highlights include onsite dining, free Wi-Fi and a sauna. Vladivostok is a medium-sized city situated alongside Golden Horn Bay and close to the border of North Korea. Nearby places of interest include Arsenyev Primorye Museum, the Port of Vladivostok and Svetlanskaya Street. Local bus services provide fast and easy access to other popular Vladivostok destinations. The hotel is housed in a modern mid-rise building with sea-facing balconies on every floor. Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas. Standard rooms are decorated in a basic style with dark wood furniture. They feature a balcony with views of Amur Bay. Amenities include a TV, fridge and a work desk. Free Wi-Fi is available in some rooms. The en-suite bathrooms feature a walk-in shower. The hotel restaurant offers Indian, Japanese and European dishes. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. Free parking is possible onsite. The hotel has a 24-hour reception.
